CustomField.description: The source holding the related adjustment amount. If the adjustment source does not hold a value, the value would default to the related adjustment amount.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The source holding the related adjustment amount. If the adjustment source does not hold a value, the value would default to the related adjustment amount.
CustomField.label: Related Adjustment Amount Source

lookupFilter.infoMessage: Please select a field that holds the related adjustment amount
